title: Weapon Master
content:
to choose between an Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat.

Weapon Master Information

You gain Proficiency with four weapons of your choice, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

How to unlock Weapon Master

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Weapon Master

All Classes at Level 4

Weapon Master Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here

All Feats in Baldur's Gate 3 Ability Improvements ♦ Actor ♦ Alert ♦ Athlete ♦ Charger ♦ Crossbow Expert ♦
